name: Invasion (itch) (Bad Weather Studios)
description:
Invasion

[Developed for the Video Games Lab : Game Jam 2021]

Invasion is a 2D platformer arcade game created with Unreal Engine 4. Protect your cute little farm animals 🐷 from the evil invaders 👽 !

You are a farmer guy who has been suddenly attacked by a group of alien invaders who want to harm your precious animals.

How long will you be able to protect your animal friends?😨

Good luck !

Controls Gamepad
  • D-PAD : Move
  • Left stick : Move
  • Pause : Pause
  • A : Jump
  • X : Attack
Keyboard
  • Arrows/WASD/ZQSD : Move
  • Space : Jump
  • Left/Right CTRL or Left/Right Shift : Attack
  • Escape / P / Pause Break : Pause
Features 
  • Defy the time for your farm's survival
  • Handmade game art 
  • CUTIE PIGS 🐷
Configuration Windows
  • Intel Core i3
  • Intel HD 4000
  • 4Gb of RAM
  • Windows 7 or later
Credits
  • Game Design - Maxim Lopez
  • Concept/Art/Music - Emilie Henreaux
Know issues
  • Remaining pigs counter bugs
  • Collision issues between aliens and player
  • Player paralysis issues
  • Border display issues
Note

Don't hesitate to let a comment and give us your feedback. We can't wait to hear it ! Also, we would be very pleased to play the other soumissions for the Video Games Lab : Game Jam 2021, so share them with us 😄
